name: The Zen POS
body:
### Welcome to The Zen POS
The zen pos is simple point of sales made with [angularjs](http://angularjs.org) + [mobileangularui](http://mobileangularui.com) for the sake of showing the world that web app could be in everywhere right now we got webapp-version and phonegap-version we plan build cloud-version in the future

#### Quick Start guide
```
$ copy thezenpos to your www folder
$ try it with http://localhost/thezenpos in your browser
$ done! you can use thezenpos now
```

### Screenshot
 ![](http://placehold.it/300x300)![](http://placehold.it/300x300) 
![](http://placehold.it/300x300)  ![](http://placehold.it/300x300)

### Feature
| Feature | Desktop | Phonegap |
| ------- | ----------- | -----|
| Product Management      | Yes. | Yes. |
| Dashboard    | Yes. | Yes. |
| Order/Billing   | Yes. | Yes. |
| Inventory Management   | Yes. | Yes. |
| Sales Report    | Yes. | Yes. |
| Printing Bill      | Yes. | No. |
| Product Photo | No. | Yes. |

### Getting Involve? or Contact
Having trouble with Point of sales? contact contact@picnii.me and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
